definitions.title: n. pr. m. 1.
definitions.body: priest, time of Zerub. Ne 12:3 (= [[מְרָיוֹת]], q. v., v:Ne 12:15) LXXL Mareimwq.
priest, time of Ezra and Neh., Ezr 8:33, Ne 3:4, Ne 3:21, Ne 10:6 (prob. same). LXX Mereimwq, Meramwq, etc.
one of those who had taken strange wives Ezr 10:36. LXX Ieramwq, A Maremwq.
